pages.text: Certain rocks have the ability to mimic other substances when attempting to follow the $(bold)Copy$() command.$(br2)Some individuals have used this ability to aid in the creation of illicit substances.$(br2)$(bold)Do Not$() attempt to sniff, lick, or otherwise ingest Pet Rocksâ„¢ that are copying a foreign substance.
Doing so may result in deadened nerves, heightened senses, slowed perception, and nausea.$(br2)Being in close proximity to an addictive rock can result in symptoms of withdrawal.
